# MBLAZE

This is an in process worker house for doing asynchronous tasks in nodeJs.
Workers can receive task from various brokers like RabbitMq, Redis or a in process queue.

![Image of Yaktocat](https://download.wetransfer.com//eu2/4a9c0f80da5a29f0b707489e3cef2acb20200304115900/e5846cc4054dddb5ce87ea2d20dad15830a59937/mblaze-arch.svg?cf=y&token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..NjlWHyb-N3fJsNsaxlS1KVNYKeJp2DLigA5tSDfS-gY)
